translations: （Serie）人名；（意）塞列；（日）悌江（姓）；（瑞典）塞里

sentences.sentence: Van Bommel joined Milan from Bayern Munich in January 2011 and helped the team to the Serie A title in his first year at San Siro.
sentences.translation: 范博梅尔在2011年一月从拜仁慕尼黑队加盟到了米兰队，并在他来圣西罗的第一年就帮助球队夺得了意甲冠军。

sentences.sentence: "I grew up watching Serie a on TV," he said.
sentences.translation: “我是在电视上看着意甲长大的，”他说。

sentences.sentence: The potency of Serie a could take a while to be restored fully.
sentences.translation: 意甲联赛的力量完全恢复还要过一段时间。
